Yes, very true.

God, I can't imagine if one of my family members was gay. That would completely destroy me. 

And while being gay is bad enough, being trans is a million times worse. Can you imagine if your dad suddenly walked into the room wearing a dress, lipstick, and a wig and started talking to you in a high-pitched feminine voice...? Fucking nightmare fuel.

That's why it's so important to throw these degenerate faggots back into the closet. They're spreading like the AIDS that resides in their assholes.

The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

post.body:
Why are guilds with admin designated "offensive" content now opt-in instead of opt-out?

@captainmeta4 @kek

If you believe this is the right course of action, fine... but how can you justify an opt in instead of an opt out?

Same goes for politics. You are censoring what people can see by default - you cannot rule out that users may not be aware you are hiding content with this opt in method.

This is not what you stated Ruqqus would be about. What happened to shining a light and challenging controversial opinions, not letting them fester in the dark?

Why are you abandoning your stated principles now?

This should NOT be OPT IN. It should ONLY be OPT-OUT.
post.body_html:
Why are guilds with admin designated "offensive" content now opt-in instead of opt-out?

@captainmeta4 @kek

If you believe this is the right course of action, fine... but how can you justify an opt in instead of an opt out?

Same goes for politics. You are censoring what people can see by default - you cannot rule out that users may not be aware you are hiding content with this opt in method.

This is not what you stated Ruqqus would be about. What happened to shining a light and challenging controversial opinions, not letting them fester in the dark?

Why are you abandoning your stated principles now?

This should NOT be OPT IN. It should ONLY be OPT-OUT.

guild.description:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file _bugs_. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.

> would feel myself a failure if I had a kid turn out gay.

Why do you assume it would be caused by anything of your doing? If your kid loses their arm in an accident is that your fault? Or if they're mentally ill? Heck even stuff they do on purpose like drugs wouldn't even be your fault unless you encouraged it. Things just happen, things go wrong, and the world isn't perfect.

parent.body:
It is a mental illness and not all mental illnesses can be cured.  I certainly don't think it should be encouraged and would feel myself a failure if I had a kid turn out gay.  But, fully condemning is too much.  Perhaps we should stop it before it starts by making it socially permissible for many people to **NOT** have kids.  So many parents have families merely because they fear society's disapproval if they don't.  Those parents or married people never really wanted it, but felt pressured. Neither of my parents had any business having kids. It sure seems that both dislike kids.
So, I think gay people are really just victims of bad parenting and later in life want to punish society by beating us over the heads with their gayness, shoving it down our throats.  Most gay people are extremely hurt, **BITTER** people.  And, trannies are the absolute worst.  Even many gays think trannies are mental fruitcakes and they avoid them.
parent.body_html: It is a mental illness and not all mental illnesses can be cured. I certainly don't think it should be encouraged and would feel myself a failure if I had a kid turn out gay. But, fully condemning is too much. Perhaps we should stop it before it starts by making it socially permissible for many people to NOT have kids. So many parents have families merely because they fear society's disapproval if they don't. Those parents or married people never really wanted it, but felt pressured. Neither of my parents had any business having kids. It sure seems that both dislike kids. So, I think gay people are really just victims of bad parenting and later in life want to punish society by beating us over the heads with their gayness, shoving it down our throats. Most gay people are extremely hurt, BITTER people. And, trannies are the absolute worst. Even many gays think trannies are mental fruitcakes and they avoid them.

post.body:
Hear me out. No doubt you won't be quick to believe me after recent events, so please read this whole post before judging my legitimacy for yourself.

Apologies in advance if there are problems with the embed.

Yes, I'm well aware there was a recent hoax involving the account Sion321, a hoax which used a "fake" Discord server - the RCP - to make it look like they were Chinese agents or some bullshit. A far-fetched idea.

However, the server is, indeed, real. There is a channel that was once used for perpetrating the illusion. Now that the whole thing is over, what do you think the server is used for?

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791374050566864896/RCP5_2.png)

As of now, they are using the server to vote brigade, swaying the direction of posts they like/dislike. Posts they want to reach the front page and posts they would rather keep hidden. Furthermore, they have specifically stated multiple times there are certain users they want exiled from their guilds, making lists of users to ban and such activities - all in all, generally acting to sway Ruqqus in their favor. A certain admin is in on this as you will see.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373875639353384/RCP3_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373806379859978/RCP2_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373752763678720/RCP1_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791374094817165323/RCP6_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791379084436307998/RCP7_2.png)

I joined the RCP back when it was a joke server pretending to be a cabal. Now it's swaying in the other direction. When I signed up for Ruqqus, I was promised this kind of shit wouldn't swing here, turns out I was wrong to believe that.

Make of this what you will. If you don't believe me, please, at least take this with a grain of salt. I can't say I'm on anybody's side here. As far as I'm concerned, all I want to do is prevent bullshit like this from turning Ruqqus into what it promised to never become.
post.body_html:
Hear me out. No doubt you won't be quick to believe me after recent events, so please read this whole post before judging my legitimacy for yourself.

Apologies in advance if there are problems with the embed.

Yes, I'm well aware there was a recent hoax involving the account Sion321, a hoax which used a "fake" Discord server - the RCP - to make it look like they were Chinese agents or some bullshit. A far-fetched idea.

However, the server is, indeed, real. There is a channel that was once used for perpetrating the illusion. Now that the whole thing is over, what do you think the server is used for?

As of now, they are using the server to vote brigade, swaying the direction of posts they like/dislike. Posts they want to reach the front page and posts they would rather keep hidden. Furthermore, they have specifically stated multiple times there are certain users they want exiled from their guilds, making lists of users to ban and such activities - all in all, generally acting to sway Ruqqus in their favor. A certain admin is in on this as you will see.

I joined the RCP back when it was a joke server pretending to be a cabal. Now it's swaying in the other direction. When I signed up for Ruqqus, I was promised this kind of shit wouldn't swing here, turns out I was wrong to believe that.

Make of this what you will. If you don't believe me, please, at least take this with a grain of salt. I can't say I'm on anybody's side here. As far as I'm concerned, all I want to do is prevent bullshit like this from turning Ruqqus into what it promised to never become.
post.title: An inside look at the RCP Discord server.

body: No, I'd rather neither be released because both are supposed to be private info. And don't try this logic with me, when Bardfinn's name is *willingly* posted all over social media mentioning it doesn't count as dox; only if the person doesn't want people to know it.

post.body:
Hear me out. No doubt you won't be quick to believe me after recent events, so please read this whole post before judging my legitimacy for yourself.

Apologies in advance if there are problems with the embed.

Yes, I'm well aware there was a recent hoax involving the account Sion321, a hoax which used a "fake" Discord server - the RCP - to make it look like they were Chinese agents or some bullshit. A far-fetched idea.

However, the server is, indeed, real. There is a channel that was once used for perpetrating the illusion. Now that the whole thing is over, what do you think the server is used for?

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791374050566864896/RCP5_2.png)

As of now, they are using the server to vote brigade, swaying the direction of posts they like/dislike. Posts they want to reach the front page and posts they would rather keep hidden. Furthermore, they have specifically stated multiple times there are certain users they want exiled from their guilds, making lists of users to ban and such activities - all in all, generally acting to sway Ruqqus in their favor. A certain admin is in on this as you will see.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373875639353384/RCP3_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373806379859978/RCP2_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791373752763678720/RCP1_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791374094817165323/RCP6_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791368394842046478/791379084436307998/RCP7_2.png)

I joined the RCP back when it was a joke server pretending to be a cabal. Now it's swaying in the other direction. When I signed up for Ruqqus, I was promised this kind of shit wouldn't swing here, turns out I was wrong to believe that.

Make of this what you will. If you don't believe me, please, at least take this with a grain of salt. I can't say I'm on anybody's side here. As far as I'm concerned, all I want to do is prevent bullshit like this from turning Ruqqus into what it promised to never become.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.body:
personally , I've seen medical Marijuana help people who needed it.  

On the flip side, I've also seen alcohol and opiates destroy lives. 

Let's face it, people who are doping up are probably going to do it despite the legality.  Or are they? 

I can see things like coke or maybe ex legalized,  but should heroin be sold in stores?  

This is an interesting topic indeed

Yes, I'm well aware there was a recent hoax involving the account Sion321, a hoax which used a "fake" Discord server - the RCP - to make it look like they were Chinese agents or some bullshit. A far-fetched idea.

However, the server is, indeed, real. There is a channel that was once used for perpetrating the illusion. Now that the whole thing is over, what do you think the server is used for?

As of now, they are using the server to vote brigade, swaying the direction of posts they like/dislike. Posts they want to reach the front page and posts they would rather keep hidden. Furthermore, they have specifically stated multiple times there are certain users they want exiled from their guilds, making lists of users to ban and such activities - all in all, generally acting to sway Ruqqus in their favor. A certain admin is in on this as you will see.

I joined the RCP back when it was a joke server pretending to be a cabal. Now it's swaying in the other direction. When I signed up for Ruqqus, I was promised this kind of shit wouldn't swing here, turns out I was wrong to believe that.

Make of this what you will. If you don't believe me, please, at least take this with a grain of salt. I can't say I'm on anybody's side here. As far as I'm concerned, all I want to do is prevent bullshit like this from turning Ruqqus into what it promised to never become.
post.title: An inside look at the RCP Discord server.

Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

parent.body: So it’s right for others to take away choice from others by getting them addicted to gambling, opiates, etc. Interesting
parent.body_html: So it’s right for others to take away choice from others by getting them addicted to gambling, opiates, etc. Interesting

post.body:
personally , I've seen medical Marijuana help people who needed it.  

On the flip side, I've also seen alcohol and opiates destroy lives. 

Let's face it, people who are doping up are probably going to do it despite the legality.  Or are they? 

I can see things like coke or maybe ex legalized,  but should heroin be sold in stores?  

This is an interesting topic indeed
